name: py-coloredlogs

description: Colored terminal output for Python's logging module

dependencies.name: py-humanfriendly
dependencies.description: Human friendly output for text interfaces using Python

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf
dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.

dependent_to.name: py-pyaestro
dependent_to.description:
A collection of data classes, data structures, and other utility classes
that are aimed for use in workflow

dependent_to.name: py-multiqc
dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.

dependent_to.name: py-smartsim
dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications

dependent_to.name: py-bidscoin
dependent_to.description:
Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).

dependent_to.name: py-cyvcf2
dependent_to.description: fast vcf parsing with cython + htslib

dependent_to.name: py-multiecho
dependent_to.description: Combine multi-echoes from a multi-echo fMRI acquisition.
